com.neebal.android.simplyreliable.db

Class SimplyReliableDbHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.neebal.android.simplyreliable.db.SimplyReliableDbHelper

  • public class SimplyReliableDbHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database helper class for encapsulating all the operations to be done on the SimplyReliable API data source.
    Since:
    1.4
    Author:
    Neebal Technologies

      • getInstance

        public static SimplyReliableDbHelper getInstance(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        Returns:
        the singleton SimplyReliableDbHelper singleton instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the context object passed is null

      • onUpgrade

             int oldVersion,

      • findAllOrderedByCreation

        public List<PersistableMessage> findAllOrderedByCreation(boolean ascending)
        Parameters:
        ascending - whether the persistable messages should be fetched in ascending order of creation or no
        Returns:
        the list of persistable message objects in the order of creation where the order is specified by the parameter passed

      • delete

        public boolean delete(long transactionId)
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the transaction id of the record that needs to be deleted from the data store
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether the row corresponding to the passed transactionId was actually deleted or no

      • persist

        public long persist(PersistableMessage persistableMessage)
        Parameters:
        persistableMessage - the persistable message that needs to be saved in the data store
        Returns:
        a long value indicating the unique id of the newly added message

      • findByTransactionId

        public PersistableMessage findByTransactionId(long transactionId,
                                     boolean fetchOnlyId)
        Parameters:
        transactionId -
        fetchOnlyId - a boolean value indicating whether only the transaction id should be fetched for this message
        Returns:
        the persistable message instance found on the basis of the transaction id or null if not found in the data store

      • update

        public boolean update(PersistableMessage persistableMessage)
        Parameters:
        persistableMessage - the persistable message instance that needs to be updated in the data store. The updation will happen on the basis of the transaction id in the persistable message instance.
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether some rows were updated or no
